messages.content: My friend was just hit by a train.
Um, I'm not sure. I can see lights, and it looks like an accident. I'm trying to run down there. I think he's dead.
It looks like you're on Iowa Avenue in Lexington Township. Stay on the line.
I'm not sure. The lady said I'm on Iowa Avenue. My friend just got hit by a train.
Yeah, we were walking over the track, he got hit.
I'm by the Greenbauer, near the train tracks, like 800 yards away from the Greenbauer train tracks crossing. I can see lights right now, like 30,000 yards away.
Yeah. Please, you guys hurry, he's dying.
Okay, we are, but I need you to stay on the phone. I'm going to put you on hold and get them on their way, okay? Stay on the line.
All right, you got to hurry, please.
Stay on the line, hold on.
Oh my God, come on. Oh, my God. No. Oh, my God. No.
I'm not sure. The lady just left me. My friend just got hit by a train.
Yeah, we were walking and a train got hit.
I'm by Greenbauer, by the train tracks, like 800 yards away from the Greenbauer train tracks, like crossing. I can see lights right now, like 30,000 yards away.
Yeah. Please, you guys hurry, he's dying.
Okay, we are, but I need you to stay on the phone. I'm going to put you on hold and get them on their way, okay? Stay on the line.
Stay on the line, hold on.
Okay, sir, are you still there? We're on the way. I have two people on the way, okay?
We are on the way. We'll be there any minute. Can you give me any update on whether or not he's still breathing?
Um, if you tell me how.
No, his tongue was sticking out. I think he's dead.
Okay. Well, stay calm with me and we'll find out when we get there, okay? Did the train stop?
How do you spell your name, Connor?
He's 15. His name is Cody Thayer.
Okay. Let me know when you hear sirens or anything, okay, if you could do that for me?
I can see police lights from here, but they thought that it was some kind of construction.
Okay. Well, they should be there any minute. If you can, I need you to stay on the line with me, okay?
Is there anybody from the train? Did they get out or anything yet?
I don't know, I'm on the road.
Yeah, if you see someone coming, whether it be police or fire, you need to flag them down, okay?
I could run to these people real quick.
